short_summary: Request for Proposal for Consulting and Support Services
description: The Canadian Space Agency's Enterprise Project Management Office (EPMO) team requires the services of external consultants to provide assistance with a series of CSA Projects, Project Portfolio activities and support to periodically perform analysis of processes and tools in order to propose possible improvements.
full_summary:
# Project Management Consulting and Support for Enterprise Project Management Office

## Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number**: PW-22-01013410
* **Solicitation Number**: 9F037-22-0038
* **Publication Date**: November 11, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 9, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Contracting Entity**: Canadian Space Agency (CSA)
* **Contracting Authority**: Julie Mercier (julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions**: Canada
* **Contract Duration**: One year from the contract award date

## Tender Description

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) requires external consultants to provide project management consulting and support services for its Enterprise Project Management Office (EPMO) team. The services will assist with various CSA projects, project portfolio activities, and support for process and tool analysis to propose improvements.

Key responsibilities will include:

* Project management activities aligned with CSA's Investment Governance and Monitoring Framework (IGMF) and Integrated Project Management Operating Standard
* Providing a senior project manager (lead PM) for approximately 12 days per month and three additional resources for 40 days per year
* The three resources must have intermediate or higher skill levels in business consulting, project management, risk management, and engineering

## Solicitation Process

This is a competitive solicitation process, open to pre-qualified suppliers under the Task and Solution-Based Informatics Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TSPS) # E60ZT-18TSPS/D. The estimated requirement dollar value range is above $100,000 and up to $3,750,000.

For more information and to obtain the solicitation documents, please contact Julie Mercier at julie.mercier@asc-csa.gc.ca or refer to the PSPC's Contact Acquisitions page. 

Document Safeguarding:  This procurement is subject to the Canadian Government's security clearance requirements. Suppliers must ensure that all documents and information exchanged as part of this procurement process are handled in accordance with this requirement.

Solicited Documents can be downloaded through the Canada Buys portal (https://buyandsell.gc.ca/access-the-supply-chains/service-providers). Suppliers can submit their quotes by the closing date and time specified in this notice.

Please note that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may
